name: bundler
description: Use Ruby's Bundler automatically for some commands.
author: oh-my-fish
readme:
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-007EC7.svg?style=flat-square)

bundler ======= Overrides the following default calls to append `bundle exec` if such gem is available within the context of bundler. Default calls ------------- * annotate * cap * capify * cucumber * dashing * guard * kitchen * middleman * nanoc * puma * rackup * rainbows * rake * rspec * rubocop * ruby * shotgun * sidekiq * spec * spinach * spork * thin * thor * unicorn * unicorn_rails You can add more bundled executables in your config.fish: ```fish set bundler_plugin_execs jekyll mustache ``` Install ------- > *Note*: You need to have `bundler` installed. ```fish $ omf install bundler ``` Usage ----- ```fish $ guard -i ``` or ```fish $ ruby -v ``` License ======= [MIT](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) Â© [bpinto](http://github.com/bpinto) et [al](https://github.com/bpinto/plugin-bundler/graphs/contributors)
